option.name: artifactRules
option.value: work/log => logs.zip **/hs_err*.log => crashdumps.zip **/core => crashdumps.zip ./**/target/rat.txt => rat.zip ./dev-tools/IGNITE-*-*.patch => patch /home/teamcity/ignite-startNodes/*.log => ignite-startNodes.zip

build-runners.order: RUNNER_1, RUNNER_264, RUNNER_287, RUNNER_225, RUNNER_265, RUNNER_266

runner.name: [WA] Hibernate 5.3 work around for old branches
